variants.p: One respondent to ED/2013/4 was concerned that some might interpret the requirements to attribute contributions from employees or third parties to periods of service to mean that the accumulated value of contributions should be deducted from both the defined benefit obligation and the plan assets. The IASB noted that the plan assets and the defined benefit obligation would increase by the amount of the contributions paid. This is because the contributions that are paid increase the employer’s obligation to the employees even if those contributions are attributed to other periods of service to reflect the net cost to the employer.
